mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_comment (num, writer, content, target_id, ref_group, comment_group, regdate) VALUES(#{num}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{target_id}, #{ref_group}, #{comment_group}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(ROWNUM), 0) FROM board_comment WHERE ref_group=#{num}
SELECT num, writer, content, target_id, ref_group, comment_group, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS regdate FROM board_comment WHERE num=#{num}
